arts.ttl: Sheffield United 2-0 Norwich City: Burrows Brace Fires Blades to Top of Championship
arts.sum: Sheffield United comfortably dealt with the threat of Norwich City at Bramall Lane as they saw out a 2-0 win without conceding a shot on goal. A brace from Harrison Burrows was enough to earn the Blades all three points to send United to the top of the Championship. arts.ttl: The Six Sheffield United Players more expensive than Tom Cannon
arts.sum: This morning, Chris Wilder confirmed during his press conference that Sheffield United have made a bid for Leicester City’s Tom Cannon. Danny Hall has since reported that Sheffield United have had a bid in the region of £10 million plus add-ons accepted by the Foxes. arts.ttl: Wilder Reveals Injury Concerns as Sheffield United Lead Race For Premier League Forward
arts.sum: Sheffield United will return to Championship action this Saturday as they host Norwich City at Bramall Lane. Following their FA Cup exit last week against Cardiff City, the Blades will look to build on their recent league success, a 2-1 victory over Watford.
